# The `BitstreamCursor` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This represents a position within a bitcode file, implemented on top of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor">SimpleBitstreamCursor</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::BitstreamCursor</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This represents a position within a bitcode file, implemented on top of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simplebitstreamcursor">SimpleBitstreamCursor</a>.

Unlike iterators, BitstreamCursors are heavy-weight objects that should not be passed by value.

Definition at line 357 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/bitstream/bitstreamreader-h">BitstreamReader.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Enumerations

### anonymous enum  {#aa57605bf1cc8d80678df30809f88b773}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="anonymous enum ">
Flags that modify the behavior of <a href="#a49c750caac5ed5f8a5333e14ada8d5ed">advance()</a>.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="aa57605bf1cc8d80678df30809f88b773a5fa70cd4fed0c4307ec20d1add4bd7bd" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AF_DontPopBlockAtEnd">
If this flag is used, the <a href="#a49c750caac5ed5f8a5333e14ada8d5ed">advance()</a> method does not automatically pop the block scope when the end of a block is reached (= 1)
</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="aa57605bf1cc8d80678df30809f88b773a5a16c31409f59d7c3dd21948608d204a" />
<EnumerationListItem name="AF_DontAutoprocessAbbrevs">
If this flag is used, abbrev entries are returned just like normal records (= 2)
</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/bitstream/bitstreamreader-h/#l00406">406</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/bitstream/bitstreamreader-h">BitstreamReader.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
